channel.title: Modis on Masumbuko Semba's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Modis on Masumbuko Semba's Blog

item.title: dygraphs for interactive time series oceanographical data
item.description: Interactive plot can overcome the dilemma of complex or detailed plot like the hour temperature records plotted over a year. They also offers readers an option or tools to explore the plot in detail. R has several package that turn static plot into interactive ones. In this post, I will show you how to create an interactive time series using the dygraphs package developed and maintained by Vanderkam et al.

item.title: Primary Production, chlorophyll-concentration and Sea surface temperature in Tanzania waters
item.description: Introduction require(tidyverse) require(oce) require(highcharter) require(lubridate) files = dir("extracted/", pattern = "chl_", full.names = TRUE) chlorophyll-a Chlorophyll-a is certainly the most commonly derived parameter in water quality mainly because of its use in determining the trophic status of waters.
